Sg. is wrong with the audio. My DivX HD certified DVD player plays it, but stops at every 10-20 seconds. I have a friend, and he told me that on his PS3 the audio gets out of sync after a while. I recommend to others also because the movie seems to be quite good after watching the first 10 minutes.

This is a great movie and because of that I don't recommend downloading this torrent. The quality of this torrent is fine but the problem is that this is a work-print, i.e. an unfinished version of the movie. Special effects have yet to be added to many scenes, sounds are wonky and there is generally a fair bit of polishing left to do on this copy of the movie.

If you decide that you can't bother waiting for the finished version of this movie then it plays best in the latest version of VLC.
